source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
  *
FROM
  ADFDemoDB.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE' AND TABLE_NAME IN ('Cars','Countries','Movies')

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	DFilename as string
}
source(output(
		ID as string,
		Name as string,
		Model as string,
		Length as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: [($DFilename),'Src_Backup/']) ~> source1
source1 derive(Length = right(toString(Length),2)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Model as string,
		Length as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['set identity_insert Cars on'],
	postSQLs:['set identity_insert Cars off'],
	mapColumn(
		ID,
		Name,
		Model,
		Length
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
